targets.rawSql: SELECT Version[1] FROM (SELECT regexp_matches(VERSION(), '(MatrixDB[^)]*)') AS Version) A;

targets.rawSql: SELECT state AS "time", state FROM local.segstate ORDER BY 1
SELECT ts AS "time", id, state FROM local.segdetails ORDER BY 1
